casebody.data:
Trap Falls Realty Holding Limited Partnership et al. v. Board of Tax Review of the City of Shelton (13067)

Foti, Lavery and Landau, Js.

Argued February 9 decision released April 18, 1995 *917Elliott B. Pollack, with whom were Lucy M. Ziobro, and, on the brief, Gregory F. Servodidio, for the appellants (plaintiffs). Thomas J. Welch, with whom was John A. Welch, Jr., for the appellee (defendant). Per Curiam.

This case is controlled by Andover Ltd. Partnership I v. Board of Tax Review, 232 Conn. 392, 655 A.2d 759 (1995).

The judgment is reversed and the case is remanded for further proceedings consistent with that opinion.
